name: CLASSIFIER
description: This table stores information about classifier records which are used in the auto status assignment and notifications processes for referrals and for establishing case management record creation triggers.

columns.name: CLASSIFIER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the classifier.

columns.name: CLASSIFIER_ID_CLASSIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The title of the classifier record.

columns.name: CLASSIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The title of the classifier record.
